analysis.statement: Identify and prioritize mitigation of potential supply chain risks

checks.description: Verify supply chain risk assessment in Azure Security Center
checks.request: az security assessment list --query '[?contains(metadata.displayName, `supply`) || contains(metadata.displayName, `dependency`)].{Name:metadata.displayName, Status:status.code, Severity:metadata.severity}' --output json

response.Name: Container registry images should have vulnerability findings resolved

checks.description: Verify container base image source verification
checks.request: az acr repository show-manifests --name fedrampregistry --repository webapp --query '[0].{Digest:digest, Architecture:architecture, Os:os}' --output json

checks.description: Verify dependency scanning and vulnerability management
checks.request: az acr task show --name vulnerability-scan-task --registry fedrampregistry --query '{Name:name, Status:status, Platform:platform.os}' --output json

checks.description: Verify supply chain risk mitigation procedures and vendor assessment
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify supply chain risk assessment procedures, vendor security assessments, and risk mitigation strategies
